termsOfService.title: Terms of service
termsOfService.content: By using this site, you agree to the following terms of service: ...

stores.title: Bienvenue sur le magasinage
stores.description: Explore our vast collection of items, from icons to titles, and discover the perfect pieces to express yourself. Whether you're looking for a new profile icon or a catchy title, we have something for everyone. Start browsing now and unleash your creativity!

avatars.title: Avatars
avatars.description: Find the profile icon that best represents you.

consumables.title: Consommables
consumables.description: Discover the consumables that will help you personalize your profile.

IconItem.help: You may use avatar icons to personalize your profile. Once bought, you will it able to use it in your profile settings.

ConsumableItem.help: Consumable grant you a varieties of effects that you can use to enhance your interactions with other users. Once bought, you will be able to use it in your profile settings.

forgotPassword.title: Reset your password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address to reset your password
forgotPassword.success: An email has been sent to you with a link to reset your password

resetPassword.title: Modify your password
resetPassword.description: Enter your new password to modify it

errors.passwordFormat: Password must contain at least 8 characters, including one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter and one number
errors.maxLength: This field must contain at most {maxLength} characters

archives.title: Archives
archives.description: Dans ce royaume enchanté, les utilisateurs partagent leurs trésors : livres envoûtants, mélodies captivantes et films fascinants. Plongez dans nos archives et découvrez des œuvres uniques. Utilisez la barre de recherche pour explorer et copier des liens vers des plateformes comme SoundCloud ou YouTube. Chaque lien partagé enrichit RawKauKau, faisant de notre site un refuge vivant où la créativité et la passion se rencontrent.

avatar.title: Edit avatar
avatar.description: Choose a new avatar to personalize your profile

notifications.title: Allow notifications
notifications.description: You will receive notifications for important activities on your account

requests.title: Hide requests
requests.description: You can choose to hide your requests from other users. They will no longer be accessible in your profile to other users.

recommendations.title: Hide recommendations
recommendations.description: You can choose to hide your recommendations from other users. They will no longer be accessible in your profile to other users.
